GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
netfilter: nft_tproxy: restrict to prerouting hook

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 343fed6b0daeb528ae5c9d4d84d9ff763ac95619, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 4ed8eb6570a49931c705512060acd50058d61616. For more details please see the references link.
